predictions.text: UK CPI (12-month rate, headline) for November 2025 will print between 3.7% and 4.3%.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify against ONS 'Consumer price inflation, UK: November 2025' release; the headline CPI 12-month rate must fall within 3.7%–4.3%.
evidence: ONS release calendar (UK CPI timing around mid-month)
Recent UK energy price cap adjustments and fuel prices
GBP level vs. USD/EUR affecting tradables inflation
monitoring_signals: ONS CPI weights and methodology notes
Wholesale energy prices and Ofgem price cap updates
predictions.rationale: Services disinflation and energy base effects likely cap headline CPI near 4% with limited upside risk.

predictions.text: U.S. PPI Final Demand (YoY, NSA) for November 2025 will print between 1.4% and 2.0%.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify in BLS Producer Price Index News Release for Nov 2025: 12-month percent change in Final Demand must be within 1.4%–2.0%.
evidence: Commodity price trends (energy, food) in Nov
Freight rates and diesel prices stabilizing
monitoring_signals: WTI crude and diesel rack prices
predictions.rationale: Moderate pipeline pressures persist but broad goods disinflation and stable energy keep PPI near ~1.7%.

predictions.text: Japan BoJ Tankan Q4 2025 Large Manufacturers Business Conditions DI will print between +8 and +14.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify in BoJ Tankan (Dec 2025) the Large Manufacturers Business Conditions Diffusion Index; value must be within +8 to +14.
monitoring_signals: Yen level vs. USD and CNY
predictions.rationale: Weaker yen and steady global demand support sentiment, but China softness caps upside.

predictions.text: China foreign exchange reserves (USD) for November 2025 will print between $3.14T and $3.20T.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify via SAFE (State Administration of Foreign Exchange) monthly reserves report; total reserves in USD must be within $3.14–$3.20 trillion.
evidence: DXY movements impacting valuation of non-USD assets
monitoring_signals: USD index and EUR/USD, USD/JPY levels
UST and Bund price changes (valuation effects)
SAFE FX settlement and sales data
predictions.rationale: Valuation effects and modest flows imply limited deviation from recent levels.

predictions.text: EIA Weekly Petroleum Status Report will show 'Finished motor gasoline, product supplied' at or above 9.2 million b/d in at least one report published by 2025-12-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify in EIA WPSR (Table 3/4) weekly product supplied for finished motor gasoline; any report through 2025-12-31 with value ≥ 9,200 kb/d counts.
evidence: Holiday travel can briefly lift gasoline demand
predictions.rationale: Seasonally low winter demand risks downside, but holiday spikes could breach 9.2 mb/d briefly.

predictions.text: From 2025-11-28 close to 2025-12-31 close, iShares Russell 2000 ETF (IWM) adjusted-close total return will outperform SPDR S&P 500 ETF (SPY) by at least 2.0 percentage points.
predictions.verification_criteria: Compute percentage change in adjusted close (dividends reinvested proxy) for IWM and SPY from 2025-11-28 close to 2025-12-31 close; IWM – SPY ≥ +2.0 pp.
evidence: Positioning in mega-cap tech is crowded
predictions.rationale: Reversion from mega-cap concentration and seasonal flows can favor small caps into year-end.

predictions.text: NYMEX WTI front-month crude will settle at or above $82.00 per barrel on at least one trading day by 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify using CME/NYMEX official settlement for CL front-month; any settlement ≥ $82.00 before 2025-12-31 (UTC) counts.
evidence: Potential OPEC+ supply signals into year-end
Inventory draws and product cracks seasonality
predictions.rationale: Tightness risk and policy headlines can trigger a temporary price spike despite macro headwinds.

predictions.text: U.S. Housing Starts (SAAR, total) for November 2025 will print between 1.31 million and 1.42 million.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify in U.S. Census 'New Residential Construction' release; seasonally adjusted annual rate of total housing starts must be within 1.31–1.42 million.
monitoring_signals: Building permits (prior month) and regional starts
predictions.rationale: Lower rates and improving builder sentiment support a modest rebound within a tight range.

predictions.text: U.S. Core CPI (MoM, SA; all items less food and energy) for November 2025 will print between +0.1% and +0.3% in the BLS release.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify in BLS CPI News Release for Nov 2025: seasonally adjusted monthly percent change of 'All items less food and energy' must be within +0.1% to +0.3%.
evidence: Rent disinflation from private indices (ZORI) feeds slowly
Used car prices mixed; airfare and medical volatile but contained
predictions.rationale: Core services remain sticky but cooling shelter keeps monthly core near the 0.2% trend.

predictions.text: Euro area S&P Global Services PMI Final (headline) for November 2025 will print between 48.5 and 50.5.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify in S&P Global Eurozone Services PMI Final Nov 2025 press release; headline index must be within 48.5–50.5.
evidence: Flash prints near 50 amid weak demand
Labor markets still tight but easing
monitoring_signals: Country-level PMIs (DE, FR, IT, ES) revisions
predictions.rationale: Final revisions typically small; services hover around stagnation near 50.

predictions.text: The UK will announce at least one Iran-related sanctions designation by 2025-12-31 via an official gov.uk press release (FCDO or HM Treasury/OFSI).
predictions.verification_criteria: A press release on gov.uk from FCDO or HM Treasury/OFSI between now and 2025-12-31 must explicitly announce a new Iran-related designation.
evidence: Ongoing UK coordination with US/EU on Iran sanctions
monitoring_signals: Iran regional activity and UK parliamentary statements
predictions.rationale: Coordination dynamics and year-end actions raise odds of at least one Iran-related UK designation.

predictions.text: CISA will add at least 12 CVEs to the Known Exploited Vulnerabilities (KEV) catalog with Date Added between 2025-12-01 and 2025-12-15 inclusive.
predictions.verification_criteria: Count entries on CISA KEV catalog where 'Date Added' is between 2025-12-01 and 2025-12-15 inclusive; total must be ≥ 12.
evidence: Typical December Patch Tuesday spikes additions
Recent exploit reports across enterprise software
predictions.rationale: Historical mid-December surges justify a higher threshold than 10 while allowing for variability in KEV additions.
